comments.en:
Partial report from Leonid Mamtchenko.
BW printing with Ghostscript works OK, although it's a bit blurry.
He hasn't tried color printing yet.
I don't know which gs device he's using.

Report from Dominik Mierzejewski :
I've configured it using RedHat's Printtool and it seems to work perfectly, although I haven't tried my colour ribbon yet. Both Ghostscript and ascii printing is ok. The driver is listed as 'Epson Dot Matrix, 24 pin', which is probably 'epson' for GS.

Consumables/Refills: ribbon
